skills.name: Spirit Throw
skills.description: Throws a small spirit at the enemy and increases your Critical Rate by 30% at next turn if you get a Critical Hit.

skill_effect.name: Increase CRI Rate
skill_effect.description: Critical Hit Rate is increased by 30%

skills.name: Cyclone
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a cyclone 2 times. Each attack has a 40% chance of increasing the enemy's chance of landing a Glancing Hit for 2 turns.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Glancing Hit
skill_effect.description: Accuracy is reduced by 50% and the chance for the monster to land a Glancing Hit of reduced damage will increase.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Double Cyclone
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a cyclone 4 times. Each attack has a 20% chance to stun the enemy.
skills.level_progress_description:
